title: verify_email_password_authentication
description: Test the /auth/signin POST endpoint to ensure users can successfully authenticate using valid email and password credentials, and receive appropriate error messages for invalid inputs.

title: verify_google_oauth_login
description: Test the /auth/google GET endpoint to verify that users can initiate and complete the Google OAuth login flow successfully, including handling of errors and redirects.

title: verify_client_listing
description: Test the /api/clients GET endpoint to ensure authenticated users can retrieve a list of their clients, with proper authorization and data isolation.

title: verify_client_creation
description: Test the /api/clients POST endpoint to validate that authenticated users can create new client records with valid data, and receive appropriate validation errors for invalid data.

title: verify_client_detail_retrieval
description: Test the /api/clients/{id} GET endpoint to ensure users can retrieve detailed information of a specific client by ID, with proper access control.

title: verify_client_update
description: Test the /api/clients/{id} PUT endpoint to verify that users can update client information correctly and that changes are persisted.

title: verify_client_soft_delete
description: Test the /api/clients/{id} DELETE endpoint to confirm that clients are soft deleted (marked as inactive) rather than permanently removed, and that they no longer appear in active client listings.

title: verify_loan_listing
description: Test the /api/loans GET endpoint to ensure users can retrieve a list of loans associated with their account, with correct data and access control.

title: verify_loan_creation
description: Test the /api/loans POST endpoint to validate that users can create new loans with correct parameters, including automatic installment calculation and interest application.

title: verify_loan_detail_retrieval
description: Test the /api/loans/{id} GET endpoint to ensure users can retrieve detailed information about a specific loan, including status and payment schedule.
